title: Mantello Tesla Coil Lighter USB Rechargeable Windproof Dual Arc Lighter, Matte Black
description: No Flame, No Gases, No fuels , Recycled, Rechargeable, Eco-friendly, Flight approval, All-weather. This Dual Coil Arc Pocket Lighter incorporates Technology into a great looking compact zinc alloy shell with a ceramic head and rechargeable Lithium-Ion battery. All of this fits in the palm of your hand and your pocket! This Technology means no flame or fuel and is powered by a high intensity electric arc ready at the touch of a button. The lighter also has a safety feature, so it will not light up when the lid is closed. Simply charge up via USB and you're ready to go. 1 Year Warranty included with your purchase. Scroll up to order your arc lighter now.
